profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Planetary Scanner
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Upload flora, fauna, and mineral discoveries for units

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Cartographer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Sell planetary charts and exploration data

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Artifact Hunter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Search ruins and ancient sites for valuable relics

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Treasure Hunter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Use treasure maps to find buried caches

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Derelict Freighter Explorer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Salvage technology and cargo from abandoned ships

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Miner
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Extract minerals, metals, and elements from deposits; set up automated mining operations

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Gas Harvester
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Collect atmospheric gases from gas giants

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Ship Salvager
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Find crashed ships, claim and scrap them for parts and profit

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Storm Crystal Harvester
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Collect valuable crystals during extreme weather

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Commodity Trader
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Buy low, sell high across systems

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: High-Value Crafter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Create fusion ignitors, stasis devices, etc.

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Black Market Dealer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Deal in suspicious goods at pirate stations

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Bounty Hunter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Take contracts to eliminate pirates

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Pirate
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Attack freighters and steal cargo

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Sentinel Hunter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Destroy sentinels for rare technology

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Exterminator
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Clear infestations from planetary sites

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Agricultural Farmer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Grow crops for crafting materials

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Chef
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Create valuable food items and consumables

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Oxygen Farmer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Harvest and refine oxygen for profit

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Living Ship Breeder
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Cultivate and trade organic vessels

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Industrial Crafter
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Mass-produce trade goods

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Construction Contractor
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Build bases for other players

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Supply Depot Operator
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Extract resources passively via depots

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Manufacturing Plant Manager
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Automate production chains

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Fleet Captain
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Send fleets on missions for rewards; buy, upgrade, and maintain frigates; protect and escort trading vessels

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Nexus Agent
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Complete community objectives for rewards

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Settlement Overseer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Govern and develop NPC settlements

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Living Pearl Farmer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Harvest pearls from whispering eggs (dangerous)

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Salvaged Data Collector
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Find buried technology modules

profitable_activities_and_jobs.name: Nanite Farmer
profitable_activities_and_jobs.description: Refine materials or complete missions for nanites
